sect3.title: Program Files
sect3.para: Note that in LFS we don't install the pidof link by default because we use pidof from sysvinit instead.

sect4.title: fuser
sect4.para: fuser displays the PIDs of processes that use the specified files or file systems.

sect4.title: killall
sect4.para: killall sends a signal to all processes running any of the specified commands.

sect4.title: pstree
sect4.para: pstree shows running processes as a tree.
